contentitemdata.dancinggoat.email.Content:
Thank You! Your Order Has Been Placed


Order number{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderNumber","","nonHTML")!}Order status{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderStatus","","nonHTML")!}

We're paying full attention to your order. Wheather it's a fresh bag of beans or your new favorite mug, we'll ensure everything is right before it gets to you.


Order summary

Order number
{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderNumber","","nonHTML")!}
Order status
{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderStatus","","nonHTML")!}
Date created
{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderCreated","","nonHTML")!}
Total price
{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderGrandTotal","","nonHTML")!}
Payment method{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.PaymentMethod","","nonHTML")!}
Shipping method{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.ShippingMethod","","nonHTML")!}


Ordered items

{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderItems","","nonHTML")!}

Subtotal{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderTotalPrice","","nonHTML")!}
Shipping and handling{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderTotalShipping","","nonHTML")!}
Tax{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderTotalTax","","nonHTML")!}
Order total{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.OrderGrandTotal","","nonHTML")!}

{!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.ShippingAddressFirstName","","nonHTML")!} {!ResolveDynamicText("Commerce.ShippingAddressLastName","","nonHTML")!}
